name: MineboxAddons
creator: amianthus
description: A small utilities mod for the Minebox server.

name: Notra
creator: imjustprism
description: Notra is a simple utility mod built with fabric specifically for Minebox.

name: MineboxAdditions
creator: Dampen59
description: MineboxAdditions is a mod that adds blatant features to your average Minebox gameplay !

name: Minebox Journeymap
creator: ThirtyTwelveNor
description: A highly customizable JourneyMap addon that makes waypoints for MineBox.

name: Minebox Plus | Retextured Vanilla Textures
creator: tinyslimestudio
description: The Minebox Plus pack fills in the missing textures for the Server Resource Pack available at minebox.co, providing a more complete and cohesive visual experience.

name: Minebox Plus | Gray Crops Addon
creator: tinyslimestudio
description: An add-on for Minebox Plus that changes the appearance of immature crops to grayscale, making it easier to distinguish them on farms and improving crop growth visibility

name: Minebox Plus | Remove Bush Leaves Addon
creator: tinyslimestudio
description: An add-on for Minebox Plus that removes the default Bushy Leaves effect from Minebox, restoring the classic leaf appearance in the game.
